data.prayer: Jesus, make yourself known to the 745,100 people living in Meurthe-et-Moselle through the internet today.
data.verse: They have no speech, they use no words; no sound is heard from them. Yet their voice goes out into all the earth, their words to the ends of the world. In the heavens God has pitched a tent for the sun.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Meurthe-et-Moselle, Grand Est, France
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 9,155 believers in Meurthe-et-Moselle, Grand Est, France a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Father, help the 9,155 believers in Meurthe-et-Moselle to know that you can make a big impact through their simple obedience today.
data.verse: you will be for me a kingdom of priests

data.prayer: Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the county of Meurthe-et-Moselle, Grand Est, France.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Toul
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Toul, Grand Est, France.
Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the county of Meurthe-et-Moselle to agree with you in prayer.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 9,155 believers in the county of Meurthe-et-Moselle the wisdom of how to form simple, reproducible churches of 12-30 in every neighborhood.

data.section_summary:
the county of Meurthe-et-Moselle, Grand Est, France has a population of 745,100.

We estimate Meurthe-et-Moselle has 9,155 people who might know Jesus, 455,644 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 280,301 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 81 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, you already know the names of the prophets you want to raise up in Meurthe-et-Moselle. Please, raise them up and give them the courage to speak your truth to your church.
data.verse: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, and before you were born I consecrated you; I appointed you a prophet to the nations.
